verbose_text: On the other hand, negative plasticity resembles the notion of facultative cheating [XREF_BIBR], a cellular strategy implemented by different molecular mechanisms : generation of iron scavenging pyoverdin molecules--iron being an essential PG in some environments--is reduced when enough molecules are already in the environment minimizing in this way the ability of cheaters to invade [XREF_BIBR]; production of invertase, a PG necessary to hydrolyse glucose, is also repressed when not needed [XREF_BIBR].
